markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Grip Throat](/Actions.aspx?ID=1269) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast](/Sources.aspx?ID=139) pg. 78</row>

</column>

---

The hand attempts to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) a Medium or smaller creature by the throat. If the Grapple succeeds, in addition to the normal effects, the creature has difficulty speaking. While it remains [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) by the hand, it must spend an extra action to perform any action that has the verbal trait.
name: Grip Throat
